name: Micro Hexagon
summary: Micro Hexagon is a minimal action game by Paul Koller, with music by Mikkel Hastrup. This Commodore 64 reinterpretation of the original SUPER HEXAGON was released on the 1st December 2013 as an entry in the RGCD C64 16KB Cartridge Game Competition (2013), in which it achieved 2nd place.
